document_data.name: Turis
document_data.mainbody: The '''turis''' was a variety of tree that grew in the mountains of [[Cormyr]] in [[Interior Faerûn|central Faerûn]]. They were most commonly found above the timberline in both the [[Storm Horns]] and [[Thunder Peaks|Thunder Peak Mountains]].
document_data.Usage: Beneath the tough bark of the turis was a sap that was used in the creation of a restorative salve. When properly applied to less-severe wounds, it would heal them without leaving a scar. It would have no effect when applied to injuries caused by [[magic]]al [[weapon]]s.
